title: MoQ Introduction by Mike Hill on Robert Breedlove's Channel  - A few thoughts and Comments on Ep. 1
description:
Excellent intro to the Metaphysics of Quality on Robert Breedlove's "What is Money" Channel. Using Bitcoin as a real world Anchor, philosopher/Artist/Film Pro Mike Hill gives us what is essentially an intro course on Pirsig's worldview. The MoQ is an all-inclusive framework that can elucidate the solutions to the problems facing us - overwhelm of info, exponential category fragmentation, substandard models of physical reality, breakdown of the social level, and the Meaning Crisis - and give us a new lens in which to move forward holistically to a future that's better not worse.

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2jAZ0x9H0bQik_Rk4bOrL3QFl9rxmX7a
